snippet: The leader of the Senate Armed Services Committee said hearings would be held on the sources behind articles on a “kill list” for terrorists and cyberwarfare against Iran.
abstract: Senate announces that it will investigate national security leaks to the news media after articles appeared in The New York Times about a 'kill list' for terrorists and the use of cyberweapons against Iran.
lead_paragraph: The leader of the Senate Armed Services Committee said hearings would be held on the sources behind articles on a “kill list” for terrorists and cyberwarfare against Iran.

headline.seo: Senators Want Inquiry on National Security Leaks
headline.main: Senators to Open Inquiry Into ‘Kill List’ and Iran Security Leaks
headline.print_headline: Senators to Open Inquiry Into ‘Kill List’ and Iran Security Leaks
